text: @realDonaldTrump @POTUS Greeting vets w/ no masks on, knowing you were exposed to Coronavirus, because you are a lowlife vain idiot, who doesn't want to be photographed wearing mask. You're an  irresponsible, incompetent, dangerous piece of sh*t! #TrumpIsOurBiggestThreat #GetOutTrump #DeadlyDonald https://t.co/TxJsXB0rlL
